basics.name: Miguel Sainz Jr.
basics.label: Full Stack Web Developer
basics.summary: Miguel is a versatile full stack web developer with over 7 years professional experience. Responsible for building elegant solutions for a wide variety of clients, including, but not limited to, training and assessment/certification providers, e-commerce, tourism, and health care organizations.

work.summary: At Willetts Miguel worked alongside a group of skilled developers focused on building custom web based software tuned to client's business requirements.
highlights: Designed and developed a custom platform for the Manufacturing Skills Standards Council, an industry-led, training, assessment and certification system that provides front-line production and material handling workers with two industry-defined and federally-endorsed certifications.. The resulting system addressed all MSSC's needs by connecting the three pillars of the business, their assessment centers, candidates and employers.

Worked closly with MBS Keystone to develop a work order management and time clock application. This system allowed their technicians to create and manage work orders, purchase orders and keep track of their time while in the field.

work.summary: Miguel's time with briskData was spent developing a wide variety of solutions for businesses including public facing websites and internal tools.
highlights: Worked with Offenbachers to create various internal, intranet applications to improve their day to day workflows as well manage and maintain their public facing website.

work.summary: As a support developer Miguel's responsibilities included issue remediation, new feature development and server management.
